items.title: Senate Democrats find many ethical lapses by Supreme Court justices
items.description: A 20-month investigation by Democrats on the Senate Judiciary Committee found that Justice Clarence Thomas failed to report jet and yacht trips.

items.title: Congress also approved boosts to Social Security payments and disaster aid
items.description: The federal government avoided a shutdown. Here are some notable takeaways from legislation that cleared the House and Senate this week.

items.title: Lara Trump drops out of contention for U.S. Senate seat for Florida
items.description: President-elect Donald Trump had indicated to Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis that he wanted his daughter-in-law to be appointed.

items.title: How Trump and Musk set off the shutdown crisis — but got little in return
items.description: The past week provides a preview of what spending battles could be like in a closely divided Congress and with warring GOP factions.

items.title: Trump names ‘Apprentice’ creator Mark Burnett as special U.K. envoy
items.description: The scope of Burnett’s diplomatic role was not immediately clear. Such posts are usually set up for countries where there are conflicts or the U.S. ha...
